author: zingmars
comment: Works fine overall, but the UI group messages could be improved. The way it works right now is that the app seperates each person in a group, so your message history has an entry for each person which makes it impossible to read through a group chat's conversation history using this app.

author: Matt Huckle
comment: Works really well with my fossil watch but paid for full version had to reinstall and now wants me to pay again. Pls help, All issues resolved (thank you). I am using a fossil  3rd gen Q Explorist watch and an android phone, messages email calendar in fact all apps from appfour are working perfectly. Messages and mail come thru within a second of my phone going off, love it

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Hi Matt, simply restarting the smartwatch should solve the problem. :) If you bought the bundle please install the app you made the purchase on before rebooting.

author: Steve Northrup
comment: I like it but would like it a lot more if it would stop notifying me of a text once I swiped it away. I don't need a notification every minute for a message I've already read and swiped away. Please stop the repeat notifications!!

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Hi Steve, we are not aware of this issue. Please send us a little more information about the devices you use and your Android Wear version. We would like to fix this behavior if we can reproduce it. Please use support@appfour.com for communication. Thank you in advance!

author: Genna Peltier
comment: I cant stand it!! I use this with my fossil watch and i receive every text 30s-1min after i receive a text on my phone. It sounds small...but it's the most annoying thing ever! I am about ready to get rid of this watch and switch back to samsung so I dont have to deal with the delay.

author: stephen collings
comment: Forked out for full version. ZERO functionality on fossil q explorist. No whatsapp messages received. So disappointed

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Please reach out to our support team to get help or a refund. (support@appfour.com)

author: Natalia Alicia San Martin
comment: DOESNT WORK. I bought the full version and I've been trying to send messages but as soon as I press the send button the message disappears! I check my phone and sure enough it didn't send. It was really embarrassing when I was showing it off to someone and tried 3 times to send them a message and it didn't work. I want a refund!

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Please contact support@appfour.com for help or refund. Thank you.

author: Janeth R
comment: I bought the full version after trying the free version, once bought I stopped getting messages on my fossil Q. I want a refund if it won't work.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Please contact support@appfour.com for help or refund. Thank you.

author: AKIS A.
comment: Great app. But after minutes I cannot send message. It's like each conversation is a connection. If the conversation don't update frequently the watch loses connection.  If you send one text from phone or receive a new one the app works again. I hope is a bug. I am using it for Facebook messenger.

author: Katie Knight
comment: Very confusing app, also non stop wanting you to upgrade

author: carmel hogarth
comment: Rubbish paid for full version and can't receive what's app msgs or normal texts. Waste of money

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Please check out our latest version and let us know via support@appfour.com if your issue is persisting.

author: Sally Snowden
comment: Wasn't sure this would work as I have an old smartwear but it's absolutely brilliant and works really well. Would recommend this to anyone with android smartwear,

author: Leigh Hostein
comment: Have purchased the full version yet every time I open the app it's still locked to free version. PayPal payment for it seemed to go through no problem... No surprise there. Have tried app reinstall, no joy. Please either resolve or refund me.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Hi, please restart your smartwatch or contact support@appfour.com for further help.

author: Antonio De Cinque
comment: The app is very good. However, I can't seem to see profile pictures in Whatsapp messages. Would be 5 stars otherwise.

author: Heidi S
comment: Doesn't work. Not getting a single Facebook message.  I'm also not able to send messages. This app is unusable.

author: Sasibalan TAMB
comment: None of my WhatsApp messages appeared.Bought the full version too,very disappointed.Complete waste of time and money

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Please contact support@appfour.com for help or refund.

author: Ghassani Muzakki Sabila
comment: How can i restore my full access of this app? I purchased this app several years ago but it ask me to do another purchase

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Please contact support@appfour.com for help. Thank you.

author: T. Taylor
comment: The SMS function stopped working

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Please get in contact with support@appfour.com for assistance.

author: Candice Mo
comment: horrible some messages come in and some don't leaving you in limbo

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: We would appreciate your bug report to support@appfour.com to learn more about this problem. Please send us your device specifics so we can look into this issue.

author: rickye harmon
comment: Works so far other than doubling my messages. The app will receive a message but the watc

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: You can disable notifications for the original messengers inside the settings of the Android Wear App. If you need help feel free to contact us via support@appfour.com.

author: Fondell Williams
comment: I purchased the flat rate and now have changed phones and no longer have access to my purchased apps

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Hi, please install the app you purchased the bundle with and restart your watch. If you need further assistance feel free to contact our support team via support@appfour.com. Thank you.

author: Be Opulentia
comment: don't like having a signature on every message

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: You delete or edit the signature in the settings of the companion app on your phone. This feature requires full version though.

author: Daniel S
comment: Jan 22 2018 update...  MMS group messages dont show up on watch.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: We will look into it, thank you, Daniel.

comment: Always waiting for wifi. Never worked

author: violet king
comment: Can not use it on watch

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Please let us know what exactly the issue is. You can contact our support via support@appfour.com.

author: William Gonzalez
comment: I want my money back !!, please communicate. Thank
Save your money.

author: Whitney Cruz
comment: Doesn't work

author: heriberto velez
comment: Love it, so easy and always stay connected to text, nice!!!

author: venkat chalapathi
comment: For whatsapp and SMS this app is working great

author: Antonie Butler sr
comment: Great app works very well.

author: sherry boose
comment: Like it

author: Mark Mansbridge
comment: Very good

author: Apel Mad
comment: Awesome...pls rate it...
It won't even let the app open , it just said app has stopped .

author: Chirase Warren
comment: They need to add group messaging and the ability to compose a new message

author: Dmitri S.
comment: Only ads and upgrade offers. Useless

author: Kyle Mellom
comment: This is the message app you want

author: Julio Astacio
comment: On

author: Sneaky Thomas
comment: Love it

author: Edgar C.
comment: I liked it so much that I ended up paying to unlock all of the features, would have been five stars, but two main things are missing. 1) I cannot compose a new text message, I can only reply to existing messages. 2) Group messages will not show up.  The one thing that stood out the most for me was the ability to use my stock Samsung Galaxy S8 messages app. If they add those two missing features, could easily be a five star app for me.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Thank you very much for your feedback, Edgar.
